casebody.data:
D'AQULSTO
v.
HEALTH SYSTEM. No. 415PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Thomas F. Ramer, for Caroline D'Aquisto.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of November 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Mission St. Joseph's Health System) shall have up to and including the 22nd day of November 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
